snippet: The Federal Reserve Bank of New York sold securities with a face value of $6.2 billion to Goldman Sachs, which beat out four other investment banks in the auction.
abstract: The Federal Reserve Bank of New York sold securities with a face value of $6.2 billion to Goldman Sachs, which beat out four other investment banks in the auction.

headline.main: Wall Street Places Big Bets on Troubled Securities
